title: The Hitcher
description: Itâ€™s summer, 1979; the good old days of pound notes, cassette tapes, punk music and free love. Steve, a second year university student, embarks on a road trip in his 1969 Vauxhall Viva. Still bearing the scars of his recent break-up with Carrie, he is on a mission to his parent's holiday cottage in Weymouth, but he didn't bank on making the journey with a sexy hitch-hiker in tow.Faye, a free-spirited first year college student, is hitching her way to meet a girlfriend in Jersey, when fate intervenes. Two strangers, each with their own agenda, find themselves thrown together in a slow-burning, tortuous tale of boy meets girl.The Hitcher is a cat and mouse game of love and lust, set in the late 70s to the sounds of the new wave era.
author: Charming Man
